# Rule 5 - Don't Selfantag
While you can be rude, hold grudges, and even be a nuisance, you shouldn't be cause as much damage and chaos as an antagonist while you are not an antagonist role.
## Precedents
- Don't start random fights for no in character reason, also known as 'RDM' (Random Death Match). A drunken bar fight over an argument is fine, randomly attacking people in the halls because 'your character is insane' is not - Don't round remove people as a non-antagonist. - Don't sabotage the station as a non-antagonist. Vandalizing the front of security is fine, smashing their windows and doors is not. - Don't steal important items as a non-antagonist. Hacking into a vending machine to steal some insuls is fine, stealing the spare ID is not. - Don't otherwise cause as much damage as an antagonist - Clowns and Mimes are largely exempt from the selfantag rules, and [bolditalic][color=#ffaa00]only the selfantag rules[/color][/bolditalic]. They still [textlink="shouldn't be a dick." link="RuleDontBeADick"] This also goes for acts taken against clowns and mimes.
